text: Avaneeswaram railway station (Code: AVS) is a railway station in Kollam, Kerala and falls under the Madurai railway division of the Southern Railway Zone, Indian Railways. It is a 'D-Class' (NSG 6) Adersh Station.Adersh Railway Stations in India ==See also== * Kollam Junction railway station * Karunagappalli railway station * Paravur railway station * Punalur railway station * Kottarakara railway station ==References== Auvaneeswaram Category:Thiruvananthapuram railway division Category:1904 establishments in India Category:Railway stations opened in 1904
title: Avaneeswaram railway station
